alert.note: Alert for Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 15 at 12:57PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Seminole, northwestern Orange and south central Volusia Counties through 130 PM EST... At 1256 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wekiwa Springs State Park, or near Apopka, moving northeast at 45 mph. This cell was exhibiting weak rotation. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Deltona, Sanford, Apopka, Altamonte Springs and Ocoee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EST for east central Florida.

area.areaDesc: Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Seminole
